item.title: Denme-Emacs
item.description: This is my first post from emacs. What’s wrong with markdown Nothing This post written in org mode then exported to markdown with ox-hugo. Org mode has Lists Foldeable Headers Property for every local element Table like excel Macro Source code highlight Source code execution and Capturing Deneme Emacs-Lisp 0 1 2 3 4 (message "This is line 1") (message "This is line 2") (message "This is line 3") (message "This is line 4") (message "This is line 5") 1 This is line 5 5 (message "This is line 6")
